SALESFORCE HELP
DOCS
SALES PERFORMANCE MANAGEMENT
Roles, Permissions, and Allocations

Determine each team member’s level of authority based on their roles and responsibilities. And anticipate query allocations in Sales Planning.

REQUIRED EDITIONS
Available in: both Salesforce Classic (not available in all orgs) and Lightning Experience
Available for an additional cost in: Enterprise, Performance, Unlimited, and Developer Editions with Sales Planning in English only, and only if you have Web Services API enabled
Permission Set Licenses and Permission Sets for Sales Planning

Meet permission set license requirements before you determine and assign permission sets.

ROLE AT YOUR COMPANY	CORRESPONDING ROLE IN SALES PLANNING	RESPONSIBILITIES FOR THE ROLE IN SALES PLANNING	REQUIRED PERMISSION SET LICENSE	REQUIRED PERMISSION SETS
Salesforce Admin	OAuth User	Process data and optimizations through the designated OAuth user.	Data Pipelines Base User	

Sales Planning Admin

AND

Data Pipelines Base User


Operations Leader	Plan Administrator	
Turn on, turn off, and set up sales planning features.
Create and manage all plans and their content, including sales plans, segments, territory plans, and quota plans.
Conduct final reviews of plans before activating and publishing.
Determine whether to designate others as co-administrators.
	Data Pipelines Base User	

Sales Planning Admin

AND

Data Pipelines Base User




Operations Leader

or

Sales Leader

	Plan Manager	
Create sales plans and all their components.
Modify sales plans and segments that they’re invited to contribute to.
Conduct final reviews of scenarios before approval and merging.
Determine whether to designate others as plan and segment contributors.
	Query for Datapipelines User for Sales Planning	

Sales Planning Ops Manager

AND

Query for Datapipelines User for Sales Planning




Operations Analyst

or

Sales Manager

	Plan Analyst	
Modify sales plans and segments that they’re invited to contribute to.
Determine whether to designate others as plan and segment contributors within their scope of access.
	Query for Datapipelines User for Sales Planning	

Sales Planning Ops Analyst

AND

Query for Datapipelines User for Sales Planning


Territory Planner	Plan Analyst	
Create territory plans from a segment.
Share and publish territory plans.
	

Required only for creating territory plans within segments:

Query for Datapipelines User for Sales Planning

	

Sales Planning Ops Analyst

AND

Query for Datapipelines User for Sales Planning

AND

SF Maps Territory Planning for Sales Planning


Quota Planner	Plan Analyst	Create quota plans from a segment.	Query for Datapipelines User for Sales Planning	

Sales Planning Ops Analyst

AND

Query for Datapipelines User for Sales Planning


Sales Managers and Reps	Sales Manager or Seller	Plan for quota attainment.	--	Quota Attainment Planning User
Query Allocations for Sales Planning

Get familiar with these allocations for query users and functions in sales planning processes.

USERS AND FUNCTIONS	ALLOCATION
Available licenses for Data Pipelines Base User	3
Available licenses for Query for Datapipelines User for Sales Planning	50
Maximum columns returned	20
Rows returned per query	10,000
Concurrent queries for all users	50
Concurrent queries per user	10
Total query calls per month	30,000

keywords: Query for Datapipelines User for Sales Planning
